assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: TechMatrix Corporation engages in the information infrastructure and application service business in Japan. It provides information infrastructure solutions in the green information technology (IT), virtualization, next-generation networks, security and storage, and other related fields; and IT services, which include lifecycle of systems comprising the maintenance, operation, and monitoring services. The company also offers various application services, such as systems development, cloud, test, process analysis, design, software development and integration, and operation and maintenance services, as well as application packages to healthcare, CRM, Internet services, finance, and software quality control markets. In addition, it offers network solutions, SDN, storage products, IT security products, and temporary dispatch and employee placement services for IT technicians; system development and training services for skill-development of IT technicians; on-premises image management systems; EV Insite, an cloud service for healthcare information; and NOBORI, an personal health record service. The company was formerly known as Nichimen Data Systems Co., Ltd. and changed its name to TechMatrix Corporation in November 2000. TechMatrix Corporation was incorporated in 1984 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.
